import { ArrowBackIosOutlined, ArrowForwardIosOutlined } from "@material-ui/icons" import { useRef } from "react"; import ListItem from "../listItem/ListItem"; import "./list.scss" export default function List() { const listRef = useRef() const handleClick = (direction) =>{ if(direction === "left"){ listRef.current.style.transform = `translateX(230px)` } } return (
